type.name: org.gradle.tooling.connection.ModelResult
type.description: * The result of a model request. * * @param <T> Type of model in the result * @since 2.13

method.name: getFailure
method.description: * The failure retrieving the model. * If this value is not null, further details can be obtained by casting to {@link FailedModelResult}. * * @return the failure, or null if the result was successful.

method.name: getModel
method.description: * Returns the model produced. * * @return the model, never null. * @throws GradleConnectionException if the model could not be retrieved.

property.name: failure
property.description: * The failure retrieving the model. * If this value is not null, further details can be obtained by casting to {@link FailedModelResult}. * * @return the failure, or null if the result was successful.

property.name: model
property.description: * Returns the model produced. * * @return the model, never null. * @throws GradleConnectionException if the model could not be retrieved.
